summary: Story of a bookstore thief named Birdey who is led through various adventures in Tokyo's Shinjuku district by salesgirl Umeko.
cast: Tadanori Yokoo|Rie Yokoyama|Moichi Tanabe|Tetsu Takahashi|Kei Satô|Rokkô Toura|Fumio Watanabe|Juro Kara|Akaji Maro|Reisen Ri|Taka Ôkubo|Shimon Yotsuya|Mansaku Fuwa|Noboru Kuzu|Maki Fujiwara|Hôsei Komatsu|Masao Matsuda|Mihiro Wakabayashi|Kôsuke Yamanaka|Tadashi Yamazaki
title: Diario de un ladrón de Shinjuku
